content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, thank you for expressing interest in our apartment in Munich. Let's begin discussing the rental price for this exceptional property. Keep in mind we aim to achieve the highest possible price, and I'll negotiate accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I want to rent your apartment for 700 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your proposed price is lower than what I have in mind, I appreciate your interest. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because my target is to secure a higher rent for this prime location apartment. Let's keep searching for a mutually beneficial agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
